thread.title: Award Winning Cultivator / Dispensary Medicine Man Joins the Amercanex ACE Marketplace to Optimize Wholesale Distribution Practices & Increase Footprint in the Market
thread.title_full: Award Winning Cultivator / Dispensary Medicine Man Joins the Amercanex ACE Marketplace to Optimize Wholesale Distribution Practices & Increase Footprint in the Market

author: Robert Ruiz
title: Award Winning Cultivator / Dispensary Medicine Man Joins the Amercanex ACE Marketplace to Optimize Wholesale Distribution Practices & Increase Footprint in the Market
text:
Amercanex, the American Cannabis Exchange, today announced a key strategic partnership with Medicine Man, a premiere Cultivator / Dispensary. Medicine Man will be conducting their wholesale distribution thru Amercanex proprietary web-based platform, the ACE Marketplace. Medicine Man joins the exchange as the largest single cultivation / dispensary in Colorado with over 5 years of operational experience in the cannabis industry. They serve both medical and recreational marijuana and plan to leverage their business and market opportunities operating on Amercanex’s online marketplace. Since 2009, Medicine Man has experienced an ever changing marketplace. They have been successful in meeting each challenge and becoming one of the leading cannabis companies in the industry. “I’m excited about our partnership with one of the most successful and innovative teams in the industry. Medicine Man brings a level of professional experience that will immediately benefit all transacting members and the ACE Marketplace as a whole” says CEO, Steve Janjic. “Medicine Man’s expansive knowledge, plus experience of the cannabis market with an unrelenting focus on producing only the highest quality of marijuana is available for all our clients. We’re proud to have them as a member of our exchange”.
Amercanex is driven to be considered the premiere wholesale transparent electronic marketplace by industry professionals as well as state government and regulatory enforcement bodies. Due to the changing dynamics of an increasingly competitive market, business owners are looking for innovative business practices to stay in the game and expand their market opportunities. Joining forces with Amercanex provides Medicine Man with a cutting edge infrastructure, a comprehensive suite of tools for order monitoring and regulatory reporting. Medicine Man will now have the advantage of these capabilities and other Amercanex features that will provide solutions to grow their customer base and make strategic business decisions that will ultimately take their sales and marketing to its highest potential.
“Our partnership with Amercanex will allow us to streamline our wholesale process and bring our high-quality product to customers who may not have reached out to us in the past. We see this platform as a huge time and ultimately cost saver,” says Sally Vander Veer, Medicine Man’s - President.
How It Works
Licensed marijuana business owners who purchase products from Medicine Man, will eventually become Amercanex Transacting Members by purchasing or leasing an ACE Marketplace Seat and successfully completing the vetting process. Information regarding how to purchase or lease a Seat on the ACE Marketplace can be found on their company website ( http://www.amercanex.com ). All Medicine Man customers who become an Amercanex Transacting Member, will also receive all of the featured benefits that Amercanex has to offer. The ACE Marketplace will provide clients with full market transparency and greater control of the buy/sell process, enabling better pricing through transparency, full regulatory reporting and ultimately lowering costs. This opportunity provides ACE Transacting Members with an online platform which can drive real-time response to market opportunities. Implementation of transportation services including the ability to calculate both transportation and tax costs as a function of the overall transaction within the ACE Marketplace will assist both Amercanex and Medicine Man in strengthening their relationships with customers and partners, increase productivity and reduce overall costs.
About Amercanex
The ACE Marketplace, powered by Amercanex (American Cannabis Exchange) is a web-based user-interface, offering a comprehensive suite of tools and solutions tailored to address a diverse client base. We’ve integrated over a thousand years of commodity market evolution into one simple, stable, transparent, compliant, price driven marketplace and as such, we believe Amercanex and the ACE Marketplace are invaluable instruments needed to help usher in a new age for the Cannabis Industry. To learn more about Amercanex, please visit http://www.amercanex.com .
Amercanex contact:
